description.ko: 빛이 우주의 깊은 공허 속으로 사라지며 미지의 거대한 규모를 드러내는, 침묵하고 무한한 우주의 깊은 곳으로의 여정입니다.
description.en: A journey into the silent, infinite depths of the universe where light fades into the profound void of the cosmic deep, revealing the majestic scale of the unknown.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a massive black hole event horizon, surrounded by swirling violet and deep blue nebulae, cosmic dust particles floating in the foreground, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, ethereal lighting, void of space, infinite darkness, silent atmosphere, volumetric lighting, surreal cosmic scale.
